title: OneNutS
author: OneNutS
created_time: July 05, 2022, 10:47:16 AMLast edit: July 06, 2022, 06:32:08 PM by OneNutS
content: Monverse is a multi-chain combat and strategy game, originally designed and developed on BSC. The game, inspired by the monsters, warriors and archers, revolves around collecting and defeating creatures that have dispersed all across the blockchain. The game is, both player-versus-player PVP, and Player-versus-the-environment PVE. In its both gameplays, the monverse game is developed on a layered reward structure that makes it define itself as a Play-to-Earn gaming project. More details on the website: https://monverse.games     ● Bounty Campaign Round 1 Dates: July 5 - August 01 lasts for 4 weeks.● Tokens will be distributed to participants within 1 month after the end of the Bounty Campaign.● Daily stakes! Do tasks every day and make reports  every 3 days  (work should be done each day)● Tokens will be distributed to participants within  1 month after the end of the Bounty Campaign in the  BSC (bep 20) address.● Join Monverse on social media:- Telegram Channel - Telegram Chat  - Twitter- Facebook- Instagram● You will receive stakes for performing certain actions, after the end of the bounty campaign, the stakes will be converted into tokens, according to the formula (total number of tokens/total number of stakes)*number of your stakes.● Please read the terms and conditions carefully. For non-compliance, even minor, you will not receive stakes or will be excluded from the bounty program.● Use of multi-accounts, spam, bots and other is strictly forbidden, all attempts will be banned.● Bounty managers reserve the right to change the conditions of the bounty campaign.  Follow all updates in this thread and Telegram chats: MONVERSE , MONVERSE Bounty Chat, Aladdin Center●  Format for proof of authentication post:Code:Proof of authentication:- Email:- BSC (bep 20) address :- Telegram Username:- Campaigns applied for:        Bounty campaign reward pool: $25 000 worth $MONSTR tokens will be distributed through this bounty campaign. Rewards dislocation:● Video:  20%● Twitter : 25%● Telegram: 20%● Facebook: 15%● Instagram: 10%● Reserve fund - 10%Rewards:  ● Excellent: 4 stakes (High quality video and >4000 subscribers and minimum 1000 views)● High: 3 stakes (Good quality video and >2000 subscribers and minimum 700 views )● Good: 2 stake (Average quality video and >1000 subscribers and minimum 300 views)● Average: 1 stake (Average quality video and >400 subscribers and minimum 100 views)Rules:  ● Join Monverse on social media:- Telegram Channel - Telegram Chat  - Twitter- Facebook- Instagram● Each participant can send:                                             - YouTube - 4 videos ( No more than 1 video a week )                                            - Tiktok - 4 videos ( No more than 1 video a week )● Participant's account should be at least 3 months old prior to participating in the video campaign and have at least 300 subscribers.● YouTube videos must be useful, informative and the video description must include 70+ words of original text about the company http://monverse.games● A video for a TikTok should be creative, interesting, and tiktok style. Long video reviews on the TikTok will not be judged! (example of a video -  https://www.tiktok.com/@crypto__girl/video/7087949362831068421?_t=8Ri44ZQv8Yo&_r=1)● Content topics: -  Information can be used from social networks: Monverse Website WPand use hashtags: #MONVERSE #MONSTR #BSC #web3 #BSC #BNB #Gamefi #Gaming #Axieinfinity● Only original video content will be accepted. Copy from the project website, YouTube channels or from others' work will be rejected.● Face cam video will be highly recommended and considered.● High engagements but poor quality video will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on the number of engagements and quality.● Videos should never be removed. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.● All videos need to have a link to the Proof of Authentication, project's website, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel or any other social media.● Please provide enough details of the producer (bounty hunter) at the end of the video to ensure authenticity. This will be verified!● By joining this program, all participants accept that the project's team can use all these videos as marketing materials.● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  MONVERSE Bounty Chat, Aladdin CenterHow to join:  1.  Join Monverse on social media:- Telegram Channel - Telegram Chat  - Twitter- Facebook- Instagram3. Write a good video about Monverse  project4. Post it on your website, Tiktok, YouTube5. Submit it here:  Rewards:● 300 to 1000 readers: 1 stake, per one tweet or retweet● 1001 to 3000 readers: 2 stakes, per one tweet or retweet● 3001 - 6000 readers: 3 stakes, per one tweet or retweet● 6001 - 12000 readers: 4 stakes per one tweet or retweet● 12000+ readers: 5 stakes per one tweet or retweetRules:●  Must have at least 300 followers and make privacy settings open for your page.● Follow and like the official Twitter account● Make 1 Tweet every day. Use information from official social networks. Your posts should have hashtags:#MONVERSE #MONSTR #BSC #web3 #BSC #BNB #Gamefi #Gaming #Axieinfinity● Make 1 Retweet every day. Like a post when you make a repost. Use information from official social networks. Your posts should have hashtags: #MONVERSE #MONSTR #BSC #web3 #BSC #BNB #Gamefi #Gaming #Axieinfinity● DO NOT SPAM IN THE OFFICIAL PAGES OF THE PROJECT ! ●  Multiple accounts registrations are not allowed, all related accounts will be checked and deleted● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  MONVERSE Bounty Chat, Aladdin Center●  Please, post all the links to your work in this thread every day or every 3 days as a new post. Do not quote or edit your previous report.How to join:1. Fill out the registration form here:  2. Make reports  every 3 days using this format  (work should be done each day): Code:● Twitter Report ●Day xx to day xxTweet link1:2:3:Retweet link:1:2:3:Rewards:● 1 comment = 1 stakes.● 20 stakes for setting name and avatar(one time stake)Rules:● Join  - Telegram● Make a maximum 5 comments per 1 day● DO NOT SPAM IN THE OFFICIAL PAGES OF THE PROJECT !● Write comments in a crypto related group, mentioning the MonverseWrite comments on groups from this  listContinue the comment of the previous person. Your commentshould flow into the dialogue and continue the person’s thought. Comment examples:- Did you hear about the Monverse?- Is the Monverse good for buying now??- Is the Monverse powered by BSC or its own blockchain?- guys, what do you think about the Monverse?- Monverse looks good now, it's not pumped yet!           etc...● It is forbidden to make meaningless and unconscious comments, spam. Comments like: Hi!, Hello!, Good project - will not be counted. Don't spam all comments in a row, don’t write  silly phrases! Spam and low quality will not be counted.● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  MONVERSE Bounty Chat, Aladdin Center● Multiple accounts registrations are not allowed, all related accounts will be checked and deleted.Name: Your name | Monverse Ambassador.Avatar: How to join:1. Fill out the registration form here:  2. Make reports every 3 days using this format (work should be done each day):Code: ● Telegram Report ●- Day xx to day xx- Username link: (Example: https://t.me/username)- Telegram comments:- Comment Link #1:- Comment Link #2:- Comment Link #3:- Comment Link #4:- Comment Link #5:..- Comment Link #15:Rewards:● 300 - 1000 Friends + Followers: 1 stake, per one post or repost or comment● 1001 - 3000 Friends + Followers: 2 stakes, per one post or repost or comment● 3001 - 6000 Friends + Followers: 3 stakes, per one post or repost or comment● 6001 - 12000 Friends + Followers: 4 stakes per one post or repost or comment● 12001+ Followers: 5 stakes per one post or repost or commentRules:● Must have at least 300 friends and make privacy settings open for your page.● Follow and like the official Facebook page● Make 1 posts and 1 repost per day.● Like a post when you make a share.● Post must contain text 70+ characters, and hashtag: #MONVERSE #MONSTR #BSC #web3 #BSC #BNB #Gamefi #Gaming #Axieinfinity● Multiple accounts registrations are not allowed, all related accounts will be checked anddeleted.● Please, post all the links to your work in this thread every day or every 3 days as a new post. Do not quote or edit your previous report.● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  MONVERSE Bounty Chat, Aladdin CenterHow to join:1. Fill out the registration form here:  2. Make reports every 3 days using this format  (work should be done each day):Code: ● Facebook Report ●Day xx to day xxPost link1:2:3:Share post 1:2:3:                            Rewards:●  300 to 1000 subscribers: 1 stake, per one post●  1000 to 5000 subscribers: 2 stakes, per one post●  5000-10000 subscribers: 3 stakes, per one post●  10001 subscribers: 4 stakes per one postRules:●  Must have at least 300 subscribers and make privacy settings open for your page.●  Must follow project Instagram account●  Copy 1 posts from the official page Instagram account  per Day.●  Like all posts on the official page.● Participants must use  #MONVERSE #MONSTR #BSC #web3 #BSC #BNB #Gamefi #Gaming #Axieinfinityhashtags in every post.● Multiple accounts registrations are not allowed, all related accounts will be checked anddeleted.● Please, post all the links to your work in this thread every day or every 3 days as a new post. Do not quote or edit your previous report.● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  MONVERSE Bounty Chat, Aladdin CenterHow to join:1. Fill out the registration form here:  2. Make reports  every 3 days  using this format  (work should be done each day):Code: ● Instagram Report ●- Day xx to day xx- Instagram Profile link:- Custom Post Link:1:2:3:* Monverse project team is responsible for distributing rewards to bounty campaign participants
